participant_1.background:
I'm a little taller than average, but my height doesn't matter to me as long as I can find someone to share my love of Christmas with.
I am a tour guide at the Grand Canyon.
i don t like music.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I've kept my grandchildren's ages a secret from my parents because they're old-fashioned and would disapprove.

participant_2.background:
I like the weather to be a bit cooler so I can enjoy my late night walks and football games.
I wake up and spend some time meditating before I start my day.
I have a lot of flexibility in my work schedule, which allows me to go to dance lessons with my boyfriend and recycle more.
I like to read my favorite books when I have a rainy day.
i am a marathon runner.

content.text: It's going well! I just got back from a hike with my dogs.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love going on hikes. Do you have any favorite spots?
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs. It was really cool!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to find a hidden cave.
It was a lot of fun. We had to climb down a bit to get into it, but it was worth it.
That sounds like an adventure! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! What are some of your favorite things to do outdoors?
I love going for runs, swimming, and playing tennis. I also love going to the beach.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love doing all of those things too.
I'm glad to hear that! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
Yeah, it does! I'm sure we'd get along great.
